name: Where is James?
description:
Where is James?

Or otherwise said: Where is your brother? I can tell you: He was caught by some pretty bad guys so let's save him.

You play as Jarles a stone-throwing adventurer. That fights with your help from room to room through the monsters that challenge him. 

The Controls are simple

W/A/S/D to run around 

Space to dash in the direction you are running

and where ever you click Jarles will throw a stone

Shopping

Everybody loves shopping and today is our lucky day everything is for FREE.

Tipps

Play in fullscreen (bottem right the Button from Unity)

Don't forget that you can Dash around it can help really. And don't forget to write a comment if you have feedback :)
